mapper.select: SELECT object_id as objectId,handle_type as handleType,handle_name as handleName,object_type as objectType, content,create_time as createTime,create_by as createBy FROM product_operation_log WHERE del_flag=0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into product_operation_log (id, object_id, handle_type, object_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, del_flag, content,handle_name ) values
( #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.handleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.objectType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.content,jdbcType=CHAR},#{item.handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update product_operation_log
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_type = #{handleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
object_type = #{objectType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=CHAR},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

handle_name = #{handleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
